meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Thea Lawton Jon Frank Julia Lee Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7391.

td.p: Thea Lawton, a nonprofit resource development specialist from Anchorage, Alaska
Jon Frank, a director of marketing and corporate relationships from Washington, D.C.
Julia Lee, a pharmacy student from San Bruno, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,599)

tr.td: WHERE AM I?
PILOT WEAR
LIKE A ROCK
ABBREVIATED REALITY SHOWS
MY CABINET DEPARTMENT
THE '50s

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Julia: What are sunglasses?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Julia: Uh, [*].)

aviators

Julia
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', 'Since 1937 Ray-Ban has been making these accessories that sound like they were custom made for piloting')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Alex: You have $600. You can risk--)
(Thea: I\'ll--I\'ll bet $600.)
(Alex: You can risk up to $1,000, you know.)
(Thea: Oh, that\'s right. Okay, make it a True Daily Double.)
(Alex: No.)
(Thea: No, make it $1,000, please.)
[Laughter]
(Alex: Okay. All right. You finally made up your mind. That\'s good.)
...
(Alex: Thea?)
(Thea: Just can\'t think of it.)
(Alex: No. Did you forget the category? LIKE A ROCK. We\'re going for [*]. [*]. So you\'re at -$400. Who talked you into going for a full $1,000?)
(Thea: Yeah, who was that?)
(Alex: Yeah. Go again.)

quarry

Thea
')
